revised_title: Magnetic Force and the Gigantic Land-Lizard: A Study of Megalania Prisca's Remains
tldr: Sir Richard Owen examines the remains of the gigantic land-lizard, Megalania prisca, from Queensland, Australia, and discusses the relationship between terrestrial magnetism and the earth's surface. He concludes that the increase of magnetic force in the region may be due to portions of the islands being raised from the magnetized part of the earth.
